name: Postoperative Malignant Hyperthermia
chief_complaint: I feel extremely hot and my muscles are cramping after surgery
prognosis: Good with prompt recognition and treatment, but potentially fatal if untreated
description: A rare but life-threatening pharmacogenetic disorder triggered by certain anesthetic agents in susceptible individuals, causing uncontrolled skeletal muscle metabolism and severe hyperthermia. Typically manifests during or shortly after general anesthesia.
